timeline.bodyText:
I think it's better if we make this a WARN log since it's technically not an error. Shall we change the log to indicate that the buffer is full and we dropped the spans (including the count) ?
Also shall we move this inside the swappedTraceSpans.size() > SPAN_LIST_BOUND if condition ? That way the log will be only printed if the traces are dropped. (we can move the spanCount variable declaration inside too then)
timeline.author: nadundesilva

replies.bodyText: LOGGER has only the debug, info and error methods, Therefore i will use a info log as LOGGER.info("span buffer is full : " + "dropped " + spanCount + "spans");
